metadata.name: Potential Persistence Via PlistBuddy
metadata.comment: Detects potential persistence activity using LaunchAgents or LaunchDaemons via the PlistBuddy utility

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/plistbuddy')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('runatload')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('true')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('launchagents')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('launchdaemons'))))

output.summary: Detects potential persistence activity using LaunchAgents or LaunchDaemons via the PlistBuddy utility
